member.name: MF_FILE_OPENMODE
member.summary: Specifies how to open or create a file.

member.name: MF_FILE_OPENMODE.MF_OPENMODE_FAIL_IF_NOT_EXIST
member.summary: Open an existing file. Fail if the file does not exist.

member.name: MF_FILE_OPENMODE.MF_OPENMODE_FAIL_IF_EXIST
member.summary: Create a new file. Fail if the file already exists.

member.name: MF_FILE_OPENMODE.MF_OPENMODE_RESET_IF_EXIST
member.summary: Open an existing file and truncate it, so that the size is zero bytes. Fail if the file does not already exist.

member.name: MF_FILE_OPENMODE.MF_OPENMODE_APPEND_IF_EXIST
member.summary: If the file does not exist, create a new file. If the file exists, open it.

member.name: MF_FILE_OPENMODE.MF_OPENMODE_DELETE_IF_EXIST
member.summary: Create a new file. If the file exists, overwrite the file.
